msContents.summary: Petition to the king against Eukles

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Verso; back is blank

condition.ab: There are three obvious horizontal folds, about 3.5-3.7 cm. apart. There is only one clear vertical fold 9 cm from the right margin, and possibly another 5.5 cm. from the same. No kollesis is visible. The top margin is 2.3-2.5 cm.

handDesc.p: Typical mid-thid century B. C. hand. An interlinear line seems to have been added between ll. 12 and13, to judge by the abnormally small amount of space between the writings of these lines, the interlinear spacing being otherwise uniformly generous.
